title: Snowpark Container Services Advanced Tutorials | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Available to accounts in AWS and Microsoft Azure commercial regions, with some exceptions. For more information, see Available regions.
These tutorials provide step-by-step instructions for you to explore Snowpark Container Services.
In this tutorial you explore how service to service communications works.
In this tutorial you create a service that uses a block storage volume.
In this tutorial you create a service that uses a block storage volume.
In this tutorial, you explore how to grant a role the USAGE privilege on service endpoint so the role can communicate with the service.
